amendment.description: Amendment earmarks $45 million of the $2.6 billion appropriated for Energy Supply, Research and Development projects to implement solar and other renewable energy technology research transfer programs.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 14 in the Congressional Record of June 27, to earmark $45 million of the $2.6 billion of funds appropriated for Energy Supply, Research and Development projects to implement solar and other renewable energy technology research transfer programs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Klug amendment (A011) Agreed to by recorded vote: 214 - 208 (Roll no. 488).
